EmailTemplate.name: Event - Roadshow APAC, October 2015.Email - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us & Meet the Tricentis VP of Product Management
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
It is a great pleasure to invite you to meet Dr. Gerd Weishaar, VP of Product Management at Tricentis, face-to-face for a visionary talk on DevOps.
This seminar will present in-depth commentary on DevOps from a functional testing perspective. It examines methodologies, outcomes and outlooks as well as testing processes, tools and techniques. Join us in this seminar and learn how to continuously test at the speed of DevOps.
- Latest computer-aided techniques in test optimization: Fewer Tests. Higher Coverage. - Extreme-automation: Automation coverage >70% - Orchestrated service virtualization: Increase your testing window
We are inviting you to attend the seminar free of charge. Seats are limited so be sure to register today to secure your place.
Auckland Wednesday, 28th October, 2015
Wellington Thursday, 29th October, 2015
Sydney Friday, 30th October, 2015
Melbourne Monday, 2nd November, 2015
Perth Wednesday, 4th November, 2015
Singapore Thursday, 5th November, 2015
Best regards,
Thomas Hadorn & Dominik Weissboeck Managing Directors Asia-Pacific
